JUDGES: Dmitry Dedov;Erik Møse;Linos-Alexandre Sicilianos;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Paulo Pinto De Albuquerque;Ksenija Turković
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The applicant , GPE banka d.d . , PERSON ( hereafter “ the applicant bank ” or “ the ORG ” ) is a joint stock company incorporated under NORP law . Its registered office is in GPE .

CARDINAL . NORP Before the economic reforms that were carried out in GPE ( hereafter “ the SFRY ” ) in DATE , its commercial banking system consisted of “ basic ” and “ associated ” banks . Basic banks had separate legal personality , but were integrated into the organisational structure of CARDINAL of the CARDINAL associated banks . As a rule , basic banks were founded and controlled by socially - owned companies based in the same territorial unit ( that is , in CARDINAL of GPE , GPE , GPE , GPE , GPE and GPE DATE or ORG and GPE ) . Socially - owned companies were the flagship of the NORP model of self - management : neither private nor ORG - owned , they were a collective property controlled by their employees , based on a communist vision of industrial relations . CARDINAL basic banks could form an associated bank ( see PERSON and Others v. GPE , GPE , GPE , GPE and the former GPE [ ORG ] , no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , § CARDINAL , DATE ) .

CARDINAL . ORG ( in NORP and NORP : GPE banka ) was founded in DATE under the laws of the then GPE . In DATE it opened an office in GPE in the then GPE . DATE until DATE ORG ( hereafter “ ORG ” ) operated as an “ associated bank ” ( in NORP : GPE banka – združena banka ) and was composed of ORG , ORG , ORG and a number of other basic banks . In the same period ORG GPE office operated as a “ basic bank ” , that is , as ORG ( in NORP : GPE banka – GPE banka GPE ) and had separate legal personality under the law of the then GPE . It was , however , integrated into the organisational structure of ORG ( see PERSON and Others v. GPE [ ORG ] , ORG . CARDINAL/CARDINAL , CARDINAL and CARDINAL , § § DATE , DATE , and ORG and Others , loc . cit . )

CARDINAL . Within the framework of the DATE reforms , the ORG abolished the system of basic and associated banks described above . This shift in the banking regulations allowed some basic banks to opt for an independent status , while others became branches ( without legal personality ) of the former associated banks to which they had belonged ( see PERSON and Others , cited above , § DATE ) .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG was re - registered as a joint stock company ( in NORP : delniška družba , “ d.d . ” ) in the then GPE . The change was entered in the register of commercial companies DATE and became effective on DATE ( see PERSON and Others , cited above , § DATE , and NORP and Others , cited above , § § DATE and DATE ) .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG was re - registered with effect from DATE as ORG ( in NORP and NORP : GPE banka d.d . PERSON filijala GPE , hereinafter : “ the ORG ” ) in the registers of commercial companies in both the then GPE and GPE ( see NORP and Others , cited above , § § DATE ) , that is , as a business unit of ORG ( in NORP : del podjetja , in NORP : dio poduzeća ) without legal personality ( see paragraph CARDINAL below ) .

CARDINAL . Shortly after its declaration of independence on DATE , GPE nationalised ORG . In DATE , it restructured the bank by virtue of the DATE LAW to the DATE LAW on the Sovereignty and Independence of GPE . Most of the bank ’s assets and a part of its liabilities were transferred to a new bank – ORG banka , see paragraph CARDINAL below ) . The old ORG was initially administered by ORG of GPE . It is now controlled by a NORP Government agency DATE ORG ( see PERSON and Others , cited above , § DATE , and NORP and Others , cited above , § § CARDINAL , DATE and DATE ) .
